thread.title: Lou Dobbs: George Will Seems to Be on ‘Personal Jihad’ Against Trump
thread.title_full: Lou Dobbs: George Will Seems to Be on ‘Personal Jihad’ Against Trump

author: Josh Feldman
title: Lou Dobbs: George Will Seems to Be on ‘Personal Jihad’ Against Trump
text:
Lou Dobbs: George Will Seems to Be on ‘Personal Jihad’ Against Trump by Josh Feldman | 9:00 pm, February 22nd, 2017 
Bill O’Reilly tonight devoted a segment to pushing back against what George Will said on MSNBC last night about conservatives potentially turning on President Trump . 
O’Reilly, who has feuded with Will in the past , brought on Lou Dobbs to pile on him for what Dobbs referred to as clear personal “animus” here. 
He said this seems like a “blood feud” that Trump isn’t participating in ( anymore, at least ), and it said it seems like Will is on a “personal jihad” against the president. 
He argued that Trump has done plenty to prove his conservative detractors wrong, and yet there’s still so much “animosity, venom, and bile” within the Republican party. 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
